# arduino-ide-ai-assistant

Arduino IDE with Google Gemini AI integration. AI-powered code generation, autonomous agent mode, and intelligent assistance for Arduino development. Supports conversational mode and multi-step task execution.

arduino, arduino-ide, gemini-ai, google-gemini, ai-assistant, code-generation, arduino-agent, arduino-ai, arduino-copilot, ide-ai, electron-app, theia-ide
